p: Viral RNA was extracted from 200 μl of each supernatant using the QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit (Qiagen, Germany) as instructed by the manufacturer. Then, the RNA was reverse-transcribed into cDNA by reverse transcriptase at 37°C for 90 min and then at 70°C for 10 min. DENV serotyping was carried out by multiplex RT-PCR [ 22].
